text: Submarino is a 2010 Danish Swedish drama movie directed by Thomas Vinterberg and is based on the 2007 novel of the same name by Jonas T. Bengtsson. It stars Jakob Cedergren, Peter Plaugborg, Patricia Schumann. ==Other websites== * * * Category:2010 drama movies Category:Danish drama movies Category:Swedish drama movies Category:Movies directed by Thomas Vinterberg Category:Movies about alcoholism Category:Movies about heroin addiction Category:Movies set in Denmark
title: Submarino
